# Celestial Patience
## Scripture
"For the creation waits in eager expectation for the children of God to be revealed." - Romans 8:19

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the winter sky, we're reminded of the celestial bodies that move with precision and patience. The planets, the stars, and the galaxies all operate on a timescale that's far beyond our human experience. In a world that values speed and instant gratification, it's easy to forget the value of patience. Yet, the creation itself teaches us to wait with eager expectation. Just as the earth waits for the seasons to change, and the seeds wait for the right moment to sprout, we too can learn to wait on God's timing. As we navigate the ups and downs of life, we can trust that God is working everything out for our good, even when we can't see the full picture.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, help us to cultivate celestial patience in our lives. May we learn to wait on Your timing, just as the creation waits for the revelation of Your children. Give us eyes to see the bigger picture, and hearts that trust in Your sovereignty. As we look up at the night sky, remind us of Your eternal nature and Your plan to redeem all of creation. May we be filled with hope and expectation, knowing that You are working everything out for our good. Amen.
